article_title: Doing what we pretend we didn’t do
article_text: If you'd like to submit a My Turn op-ed to Statehouse Report, send up to 600 words to: brack@statehousereport.com . Please be sure to include your name, residence and other contact information.
article_summary:
If you'd like to submit a My Turn op-ed to Statehouse Report, send up to 600 words to: brack@statehousereport.com .
Please be sure to include your name, residence and other contact information.
